korean: 일어나자마자 창문으로 빗소리 들려서 기분이 좀 그랬어.
우산을 쓰고 걸었는데 신발이 다 젖었어.
바지 끝도 흠뻑 젖어서 회사 도착하니까 불쾌했다.
빗소리를 들으니까 괜히 우울한 기분이 들었다.
날씨 때문인지 집중도 잘 안 되고.
점심시간에 동료가 짬뽕 먹으러 가자고 해서 같이 갔어.
짬뽕 국물 마시니까 몸도 따뜻해지고 기분이 좀 나아졌어.
오후에는 커피 마시면서 창밖 비 내리는 거 보면서 일했다.
퇴근할 때도 비가 와서 택시 잡으려고 했는데 다 차있더라.
결국 우산 쓰고 집까지 걸어왔어. 오늘은 하루 종일 비랑 함께한 날이네.
english: It rained steadily from the morning.
As soon as I woke up, I heard the rain through the window and it kind of put me in a mood.
I walked with an umbrella, but my shoes got all wet.
The bottom of my pants got soaked too, so I felt gross when I arrived at the office.
Hearing the rain sound made me feel somewhat melancholic.
Maybe because of the weather, I couldn't really focus either.
During lunch, a coworker asked if I wanted to get jjamppong, so we went together.
I felt like eating a warm soup dish.
Having that warm broth made me feel warmer and my mood got a bit better.
In the afternoon, I worked with my coffee, you know, just watching the rain outside.
It was still raining when I got off work and I tried to catch a taxi, but they were all taken.
I ended up walking home with my umbrella. Today was basically a full day spent with the rain.
